channel.title: Algiers R User
channel.description: Recent content on Algiers R User

item.title: First Meetup
item.description: Les’t Talk Data Science with R During the first meeting of the Algiers R user group, entitled; «Let’s Talk Data Science With R» organised 14th August, 2020 Mohamed El Fodil Ihadadden introduced the Algiers R user group to the audience, then he gave a brief introduction to his batata package, as a first presentation. Then, The second presentation was hosted by Nassim Kaddour, he gave us an introduction to the dash package on R, an alternative to shiny.

item.title: About
item.description: Algiers R User is group for R programming language user, founded on July 2020. This group strives to connect the R user community, in Algiers and near Algiers to promote the sharing membership knowledge and their experiences. Founding members: Members Fonction Wassim Medour Mohamed El Fodil Ihaddaden PhD candidate in Economics. Kamila Benadrouche Teacher at University M’Hamed Bouggera of Boumerdes.
